message: Hi Bob, I have a great product I think you'd be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $150.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product!  $70 is a bit lower than what I can accept at this time.  I'm willing to come down a little, though.  Would you be willing to consider $120?  This would give us both a good deal.
Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer! I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
